briefTitle: Patient SELF-management With HemodynamIc Monitoring: Virtual Heart Failure Clinic and Outcomes
officialTitle: Patient SELF-management With HemodynamIc Monitoring: Virtual Heart Failure Clinic and Outcomes (the SELFIe-HF Trial): Program

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

primary.measure: first occurrence of any component of the composite event
primary.description: acute decompensated heart failure requiring emergency department consultation

primary.measure: Number of Participants with unplanned intravenous heart failure therapy in an outpatient clinic
primary.description: unplanned intravenous heart failure therapy in an outpatient clinic

primary.measure: Number of Participants with hospital admission for heart failure
Number of Participants with cardiovascular (CV) death

secondary.measure: Time to the first occurrence of the individual components of the primary endpoint
secondary.description: Acute decompensated heart failure that requires emergency department consultation and/or unplanned intravenous heart failure therapy in an outpatient clinic

secondary.measure: Number of Participants with CV death
Change in functional capacity between baseline and 12-months
secondary.description: NYHA functional class (Kansas city cardiomyopathy questionnaire)

secondary.measure: Number of Participants with device-related endpoints
secondary.description: Safety: adverse events related to the device

secondary.measure: Pulmonary artery pressures changes mesured by the CardioMems device
secondary.description: Pulmonary artery pressures changes mesured by the CardioMems device
